body.name: Pipishell Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 26-60 Inch Flat Curved TVs, Heavy Duty Single Articulating Arms TV Bracket Up to VESA 400x400mm and 77lbs, Support Swivel, Tilt, Level Adjustment
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral by Carbon Trust products reduce their carbon footprint year after year and any outstanding emissions are offset.

features: Universal Heavy Duty TV Bracket: Pipishell Full motion TV wall mounts fit for most 26"-60" TVs, including all brands as long as VESA and Weight compatible(100x100mm-400x400mm, Up to 77 lbs).

Enhance Your Viewing Pleasure: Left and right 90 degree swivel allows you to watch TV from various spots in the room. Adjusting the angle of the screen up 5°and down around 15° lets you to block glare from multiple windows or lights. The ±3° post-install level adjustment achieves perfect TV leveling. Plus extends up to 19.5”and retracts back to 3.52” allowing a more theater-style viewing experience.

Robust & Safe Construction: Pipishell have designed this TV wall mount for strength and stability. These can be reflected to every details of this bracket. From security lock function to prevent TV from falling off and strong dual arms for providing extra support to compression hinges at high pressure points to eliminate bending.

Easy & Quick Installation: Provides all required mounting hardware and a detailed graphical installation guide which simplifies the 3 steps installation process. It is suitable for three types of wall (Concrete wall, Brick wall and Single wood stud), remember, please do not install the bracket on drywall alone. For more detailed information, please refer to the user manual.

Great Customer Service: Here at Pipishell we have been designing TV wall mount brackets for over 10 years and we go to great lengths to make the whole process of choosing your bracket and mounting your TV as easy as possible. Also our excellent customer service team are always here to help you guarantee the bracket will fit your TV leaving you free to sit back and enjoy the big screen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wall Mount Is Perfect - No Problems With it
reviews.reviewText: The wall mount was perfect, easy to install, the range of motion is perfect. The TV was another matter had to send it back but the wall mount is still up waiting for me to find the perfect TV to mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Mount was easy to install and worked great. Worked perfect for my 60” tv. Would highly recommend, especially for use as a corner mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid wall mount
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to install and worked extremely well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to mount a 50" television on the wall. I was a little concerned about all the weight resting on one stud, but it's no problem. Everything is super sturdy.My only real complaint is that to tilt the television up and down you have to reach around behind the television, loosen two bolts, adjust the angle, and then retighten the bolts without moving the angle. If you're only doing it once it's not a big deal, but if you want to adjust the angle frequently it's not the most convenient process.The mount came with a zillion spacers and bolt sizes/depths so it's hard to imagine a television (within the weight limit) that wouldn't work with it. Mine's mounted in a corner and I use it as both a television and computer monitor. Works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install, sturdy, and great movement. Very satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This wall mount kit comes with everything needed to install,even came with a level. I would recommend this to everyone that needs a swivel wall mount for their TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We’ve gotten 3 of these mounts and they have worked great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used to hang a 65" OLED
reviews.reviewText: Used this to hang a 65" OLED that I could keep flat on the wall, and pull out for a second TV for football.Works perfectly, very sturdy, and was very easy to install with three lag bolts into a single stud. Installed a power outlet next to it, and an HDMI cable in the outlet to a PS5 on a wall table below the mount, and it looks nice and clean, and pulls out easily to watch a second game.
